segments.text: Not bad . I ’ m proficient in both written and spoken English .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you tell me something about your English education ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I studied English in junior and senior high school . And in college , I took English conversation lessons . They were given by foreign tutors .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you passed College English Test Band 4 or Band 6 ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . Can you file in English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m afraid I can ’ t , but I'd be glad to learn .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You would be using a lot of English in this job . Can you manage English conversation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think I can . I often talk to foreigners at English corner held twice a week at my college . They say my English is pretty good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excellent . How is your English ability in reading and writing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have been attending an evening course in English writing for 2 years and I often read novels , magazines and newspapers in English .
segments.speaker: S2
